WRITING.TEXT: Unless someone's showing a project they're working on for class.

WRITING.TITLE: The only way I think so many liars receive recognition...

WRITING.TEXT: When you get home, all you will have to clean up is your suitcase. Dishes are done, floor is swept, and trash is taken out. This is the best Advice Mallard I've ever seen.

Found out I have depression after suffering from it for at least 10 years. Tried to tell my mom to watch out for my younger siblings, but she told me that I have nothing to be depressed about and I need to stop being so dramatic.

WRITING.TITLE: ELI5: If evolution allowed us to stand on 2 legs instead of 4, did our arms get shorter, did our legs get longer, or have our butts always stuck up above the rest of us?
